title: Where is Harrowing 2017?
body: where is the harrowing update? i thought it should of been released like 2 weeks ago

replies.body: Yea my GF really wants the Bewitching Tristana and I told her it should be back out for the Harrowing.
I don't have any info on this.  :(  Bookmark our [Sales](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales) page for any news or updates on this.
Or you mean you can't reveal any info on it. lol
Yeah mang i want lil devil teemo
